Welcome to the Health Calculator documentation!¶

This project is designed to calculate health-related metrics such as Body Mass Index (BMI). You can use this tool to calculate BMI based on weight and height, and to classify the result into categories like « Underweight », « Normal weight », « Overweight », and « Obesity ».

Contents¶

Features¶

  • BMI Calculator: Compute the BMI from weight and height.

  • BMI Category: Classify the calculated BMI into one of the following categories: « Underweight », « Normal weight », « Overweight », and « Obesity ».

Modules¶

The health_calculator package contains the following modules:

  • bmi: Functions for calculating BMI and classifying the BMI category.

Getting Started¶

To get started with Health Calculator, you can install the required dependencies using pip:

```bash pip install -r requirements.txt
